titleStmt.title: To His Highness the Lord Protector, &c. and to the Parliament of England. Valiant swordmen, and honorable gentlemen, ...
titleStmt.author: Chidley, Samuel.

notesStmt.note: An invective against cathedral churchs, church-steeples, bells, etc., anonymously written by Samuel Chidley.
Title from caption and first lines of text.
With engraved frontispiece depicting the destruction of Withcomb Church in Devon by a thunderstorn during the service time, 21 Oct.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
